skins.name: Default
skins.secIdle2Text: Commander... this doesn't go... oh forget it. It's too much trouble to fix.
skins.secIdle3Text: Thatcher and Spence are always fighting. Can't they just quiet down?
skins.secTouchText: C-Commander... Could you stop touching me for a while?! I'm getting sore...
skins.secSpecialTouchText: Being shy... is also pretty annoying...
